00028 class PluginCreator {
00030 
00033     template <class F> class LoadFunctionHelper {
00034         public:
00035             static bool functionPresent(const QString &, QDialog *);
00036     };
00037 
00038     public:
00039 
00040         virtual ~PluginCreator() { }    
00041 
00043 
00044         QString libraryName () { return LibraryName; }
00045 
00046     protected:
00047         bool loadFunction(const QString &, QDialog *);
00048         bool checkValidity(const QString &, const QString &, QDialog *);
00049 
00050         bool compile (QString);
00051         bool link (QString);
00052 
00053     private:
00055         virtual bool loadFunction() = 0;
00057         virtual bool functionPresent(const QString &) = 0;
00059         virtual void writeSource() = 0;
00060 
00061         QString LibraryName;

00064 #include <dlfcn.h>
00065 #include <iostream>
00066 #include <QFile>
00067 #include <QMessageBox>
00068 
00070 
00077 template <class F>
00078         bool PluginCreator::LoadFunctionHelper<F>::functionPresent(
00079             const QString &libName, QDialog *parent) {
00080     void *handle;
00081     F *f;
00082     const char *error;
00083 
00084     if (!QFile::exists (libName)) {
00085         QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error opening library",
00086                               "Library does not exist: "+libName);
00087         std::cerr << "Library does not exist: "+libName.toStdString()
00088                   << std::endl;
00089         return false;
00090     }
00091 
00092     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00093     if (!handle) {
00094         QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error opening library", dlerror());
00095         return false;
00096     }
00097 
00098     f = (F *)dlsym(handle, "f");
00099 
00100     if (f == NULL) {
00101         if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00102             QMessageBox::warning (parent, "Error finding function", error);
00103             abort ();
00104             return false;
00105         }
00106     }
00107 
00108     dlclose(handle);
00109 
00110     return true;
00111 }
00112 
00113 #endif
